title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully synchronize the .java file and the other resource.
SR:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
